summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4602 for the improvement of the alley in block 51, replat of blocks 44 to 53, inclusive, Mercer's 2nd Addition, being the alley between Taylor Avenue and 6th Avenue North, from Valley Street to Aloha Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 53579, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
